messages.subject: Weather Bug
messages.msgSnippet: http://www.weatherbug.com +  Timely weather ALERTS +  FORECASTS for your zip code +  Expanded TRAVEL WEATHER +  6-minute, animated RADAR +  Daily weather
messages.messageBody:
http://www.weatherbug.com

+ Timely weather ALERTS
+ FORECASTS for your zip code
+ Expanded "TRAVEL WEATHER"
+ 6-minute, animated RADAR
+ Daily weather TRIVIA
+ Quick links to popular RESOURCES on the Web

This is a really neat little program to have(I think) It will tell
you the weather in your area. If you live in a small town like me its
hard to get the weather thats true to your area, and not 50-100 miles
away :)
Tami

http://www.weatherbug.com

+ Timely weather ALERTS
+ FORECASTS for your zip code
+ Expanded "TRAVEL WEATHER"
+ 6-minute, animated RADAR
+ Daily weather TRIVIA
+ Quick links to popular RESOURCES on the Web

This is a really neat little program to have(I think) It will tell
you the weather in your area. If you live in a small town like me its
hard to get the weather thats true to your area, and not 50-100 miles
away :)
Tami
